name: py-avro-python3

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Apache Avro is a data serialization system. Note: lang/py3 version (this
package) will be deprecated and lang/py functions will be made available
for both python2 and python3.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-isort
dependencies.description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.

dependencies.name: py-pycodestyle
dependencies.description:
pycodestyle is a tool to check your Python code against some of the
style conventions in PEP 8. Note: formerly called pep8.

dependent_to.name: py-apache-beam
dependent_to.description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.
